name: Beat Roll - EDM Music Run
description:
A challenging rhythm game! Control a fancy flying ball to hit beats in music!

GAME FEATURES:
- Top Hit Music
- Easy control with one finger
- Challenging and immersive music experience

SIMPLE PLAY
- Hold and drag to control your ball
- Hit the cube and dodge the barrier
- Try new song and get high score

Free New Songs! Check the game!

Beat Roll is a music game from Jingmao Tec. Contact us by App Store or email below. We're looking forward to your game feedback to improve our game!
